author: patrickl
msg: The commons-logging package built by 'ant download' doesn't have support for log4j or LogKit in it, unless the properties happen to be set outside of jakarta-tomcat-5. This patch adds downloads for the released versions of log4j and logkit.

author: patrickl
msg: Add commons-lang to dependency list since commons-dbcp is now dependent on it.

author: amyroh
msg: Tomcat now need Digester build starting 020806 to run properly.

author: patrickl
msg: Apparently, Jean-Francois' patch requires a newer version of commons-digester to compile.
This commit was manufactured by cvs2svn to create tag 'J2EE_14_02'.
